stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Compromised IT Website Redirects Users to Malicious Website
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 12 August 2014, an information technology company\'s compromised website was reported as redirecting users to a malicious domain. The malicious site runs various javascript to fingerprint the user\'s host. No exploitation attempts or malware were observed.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: GET /Tresource/css.php?v=webhp&r=0.9327218662947416 HTTP/1.1Host: www.usascd.comConnection: keep-aliveAccept: */*Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8Cookie: PHPSESSID=3fae3bbc02fa791747eabe9188812641

POST /Tresource/js.php HTTP/1.1Host: www.usascd.comConnection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 1070Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8Cookie: PHPSESSID=3fae3bbc02fa791747eabe9188812641The web payload contained information on host, such as browser plugins/installed software.
